messages.text: Hey Bob, how are you?

text_entities.text: Hey Bob, how are you?

messages.text: Hi Alice, I'm doing well, thanks. How about you?

text_entities.text: Hi Alice, I'm doing well, thanks. How about you?

text_entities.text: Not really, just the usual routine. How about you?

messages.text: I'm planning a trip next weekend, so looking forward to that.

text_entities.text: I'm planning a trip next weekend, so looking forward to that.

messages.text: That sounds fun! Where are you going?

text_entities.text: That sounds fun! Where are you going?

messages.text: How about you, Alice? How was your weekend?

text_entities.text: How about you, Alice? How was your weekend?
